name: TOTP
natural_language_description: 这是 TOTP 节点。主要用于: Generate a time-based one-time password

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: generateSecret

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: algorithm (值: None) - HMAC hashing algorithm. Defaults to SHA1.
digits (值: None) - Number of digits in the generated TOTP code. Defaults to 6 digits.
period (值: None) - How many seconds the generated TOTP code is valid for. Defaults to 30 seconds.
